works.title: Executive control training for adolescents with ADHD: Study protocol for a randomized controlled trial
Problem mastery and motivational clarification as mechanisms of change in cognitive-behavioral therapy for depression: Secondary analysis of a randomized controlled trial

rg.name: Agnete Dyresen
rg.affiliation: University of Oslo, Department of Psychology

works.title: Problem mastery and motivational clarification as mechanisms of change in cognitive-behavioral therapy for depression: Secondary analysis of a randomized controlled trial
works.abstract:
Objective: 
In process-outcome research, there is a growing body of literature investigating the therapeutic mechanisms underlying the promotion of positive change. This study investigated the between- and within-patient effects of problem mastery and motivational clarification on outcome in patients receiving two variations of cognitive therapies...
